1.question: Which IA service should you use to create a bot from a frequently asked question (FAQ) document?

correct_answer.a: QnA Maker is a clound-based Natural Language Processing (NLP) service that allows you to create a natural conversational layer over your data. It is used to find the most appropriate answer for any input from your custom knowledge base (KB) information.

explanation.b:
Language Understanding (LUIS) is a clound-based conversational AI service that applies custom machine-learning intelligence to a user's conversational, natural language text to predict overall meaning, and pull out relevant, detailed information.
A newer version of language Uderstanding capabilities are now available as part of Azure Cognitive Service for Language.
explanation.c:
Text analytics is used for deeper insights, like identifying a pattern or trend from the unstructured text.
For Example, text analytics can be used to understand a negative spike in the customer experience or popularity of a product.
explanation.d: The Azure speech-to-text service analyzes audio in real-time or batch to transcribe the spoken word into text.

2.question:

What should you do?

3.question: Which scenario is an example of a webchat bot?

answers.a: Determine whether reviews entered on a website for a concert are positive or negative, and thenadd a thumbs up or thumbs down emoji to the reviews.
answers.b: Translate into English questions entered by customers at a kiosk so that the appropriate person can call the customers back.
answers.c: Accept questions through email, and then route the email messages to the correct personbased on the content of the message.
answers.d: From a website interface, answer common questions about scheduled events and ticketpurchases for a music festival.

correct_answer.d: From a website interface, answer common questions about scheduled events and ticketpurchases for a music festival.

4.question: For machine learning process, how should you split data for training and evaluation?

answers.a: Use features for training and labels for evaluation.
answers.b: Randomly split the data into rows for training and rows for evaluation.
answers.c: Use labels for training and features for evaluation.
answers.d: Randomly split the data into columns for training and columns for evaluation.

correct_answer.b: The Split Data module is particularly useful when you need to separate data into training and testing sets. Use the Split Rows option if you want to divide the data into two parts.You can specify the percentage of data to put in each split, but by default, the data isdivided 50-50. You can also randomize the selection of rows in each group and usestratified sampling.

8.question: You want to create a model to predict sales of ice cream based on historic data that includes daily ice cream sales total and weather meansurements. which Azure service should you use?

correct_answer.a: Azure Machine Learning, enables you to train a predictive model from the existing data.

explanation.b: The Azure Bot Service provides a platform for conversational AI.
explanation.c: The Language Service is used for understanding and analyzing text and creating intelligent applications.

10.question: You are designing an Al application that uses images to detect cracks in window-panes of buildings and warns when a window-pane should be repaired or replaced. What Al workload is described?

correct_answer.a: Computer Vision,Images of the building's window pane can be analyzed with computer vision and classified into groups based on windshield condition.

explanation.b: Natural Language Processing is used to understand and analyze text and create intelligent applications.
explanation.c: Anomaly Detection is used to analyze data over time and identify unusual changes.

11.question:
Acompany employs a team of customer service agents to provide telephone and email support to customers. The company develops a webchat bot to provide automated answers to common customer queries.
Which business benefit should the company expect as a result of creating the webchat bot solution?

answers.b: A reduced workload for the customer service agents

correct_answer.b: A reduced workload for the customer service agents

explanation.a: A web chat Bot is just for answer common customer queries - It will not increase sales.
explanation.c: There is no relation with product reliability which company is selling and a web chat bot.

12.question: A predictive app provides audio output for visually impaired users. Which principle of Responsible Al is reflected here?

correct_answer.b: Inclusiveness is about how Al should bring benefits to all parts of society, regardless of physical ability, gender, sexual orientation, ethinicity, or ther factor.

explanation.a: Transparency is about fully communicating the purpose of the system, how it works, and what limitations may be expected.
explanation.c: Incorrect. Fairness is about developing models and applications without incorporating any bias based on gender, ethnicity, or other factor that might result in an unfair advantage or disadvantage to specific groups.

14.question: Complete the sentence by choosing appropriate option in the answer area - Azure Machine Learning designer lets you create machine learning models by:

answers.a: Adding and connecting modules on visual canvas
answers.b: Automatically performing common data preparation tasks.

correct_answer.a: Adding and connecting modules on visual canvas

23.question: You use Azure Machine Learning designer to create a training pipeline for a classification model. What must you do before deploying the model as a service?

answers.a: Create an inference pipeline from the training pipeline
answers.b: Add an Evaluate Model module to the training pipeline
answers.c: Clone the training pipeline with a different name

correct_answer.a: Create an inference pipeline from the training pipeline

24.question: You want to use automated machine learning to train a regression model with the best possible R2 score. How should you configure the automated machine learning experiment?

answers.a: Set the Primary metric to R2 score
answers.b: Block all algorithms other than GradientBoosting

correct_answer.a: Set the Primary metric to R2 score. The primary metric determines the metric used to evaluate the best performing model.

26.question: You are working in a tour & tourism company. Your company wants to use the Computer Vision service to analyze images of locations and identify well-known monuments. What should you do?

answers.a: Retrive the objects in the image.
answers.b: Retrive the categories for the image specifying the celecrities domain.
answers.c: Retrive the categories for the image, specifying the landmark domain.

correct_answer.c: Retrive the categories for the image, specifying the landmark domain.

27.question: Why do you split data into training and validation sets?

answers.a: Data is split into two sets in order to create two models, one model with the training set and a different model with the validation set.
answers.b: Splitting data into two sets enables you to compare the labels that the model predicts with the actual known labels in the original dataset.
answers.c: Only split data when you use the Azure Machine Learning Designer, not in other machine learning scenarios.

correct_answer.b: Splitting data into two sets enables you to compare the labels that the model predicts with the actual known labels in the original dataset.
